成人劑量: Candidiasis: PO: UTI 200~400 mg qd Esophageal: 400 mg (or 6 mg/kg) on day 1, then 200~400 mg (3~6 mg/kg) qd Oropharyngeal: 200 mg on day 1, then 100~200 mg IVD qd Candidemia: 800 mg (or 12 mg/kg) on day 1, then 400 mg (6 mg/kg) qd Cryptococcal meningitis: PO Induction: 800~1200 mg qd for ≥ 2 wks Consolidation: 800 mg qd for ≥ 8 wks Maintenance: 800 mg qd for ≥ 8 months
小孩劑量: General dosing: PO: 1 month~17 y/o: 6~12 mg/kg/dose, followed by 3~12 mg/kg/dose qd (Duration and dosage depends on severity; Max 800 mg/dose)
副作用: 皮疹,胃腸不適、黃疸、搔癢、腹脹、腹瀉、噁心
